TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Snazi, title = Snazi, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Snazi} }

S.FORM: alang Snazi ga niya mki sku Toweng si atu Hosing Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 99 buwan, 303 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 82% kyan ku 249 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 18% kyan ku 54 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 80%, Amis 1%, Bunun 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Snazi hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Snazi hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Snazi hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Snazi hya' ga llyung. tay 'llaw na Snazi hya' ga Qmocyan. tay 'zil na Snazi hya' ga Qoyaw. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Snazi ga niya mki sko Toweng si ato Hosing Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 99 bowan, 303 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 82% kyan ko 249 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 18% kyan ko 54 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 80%, Amis 1%, Bonon 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Snazi hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Snazi hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Snazi hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Snazi hya' ga llyong. tay 'llaw na Snazi hya' ga Qmocyan. tay 'zil na Snazi hya' ga Qoyaw. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
